name: Talking Head
description: AI avatar/digital human explainer video. A realistic talking head delivers your script with lip-synced speech. Ideal for educational content, course videos, news-style updates, and personal brand content without being on camera.

config.notes: Generate full voiceover first — this drives the lipsync timing.
Takes a single portrait photo + audio file. Generates video with lip-synced speech and natural head movement.

structure.purpose: Main content. Break into 2-4 sections with clear transitions.

script_template.notes: Write as spoken word — use contractions, rhetorical questions, and short sentences. Avoid written-language patterns.

example_prompts: Use the "Talking Head" template: script is "AI is changing how we write code. Here are 3 ways..." with this portrait photo.
Make a talking head video explaining our Q4 earnings summary. Use a professional female voice.
Talking Head template: create a 2-minute explainer about blockchain for beginners. No photo — use a default avatar.
example_topics: Personal finance tip of the week
Health & wellness: benefits of intermittent fasting
tips: Use a high-quality, front-facing portrait photo with good lighting — garbage in, garbage out
Keep the script conversational — read it aloud before generating; if it sounds stiff, rewrite it
Shorter is better — 60-90s talking heads hold attention; 3+ minutes needs B-roll or visual variety
Add lower-third name/title for credibility, especially for educational or business content
If no portrait is provided, generate one with aivp-image using a realistic portrait prompt
